verbose_text: Indeed, it has been more recently reported that NK and NKT cells are the earliest producer of IFN-gamma in C57BL6 mice during T. brucei brucei AnTat1.1E infection, and that later in infection, IFN-gamma is mainly produced by CD8 + and CD4 + T cells, supporting the notion that IFN-gamma is produced by different subsets of leukocytes at different stages of infections.
evidence: IFN-gamma is mainly produced by CD8
